title: Club Mareva Beirut Hosts Thrilling Backgammon Tournament

content.raw:
Are you a backgammon enthusiast looking for a thrilling gaming experience? Well, look no further because Club Mareva Beirut, nestled in the heart of Jal El Dib, Lebanon, recently hosted an unforgettable Backgammon Game Tournament that had cigar aficionados and gamers alike on the edge of their seats.

The Excitement Unfolds

On Sunday, September 3rd, Club Mareva Beirut transformed into a hub of gaming excitement. The tournament, which ran from 7 pm to 11 pm, brought together 16 participants who were eager to roll the dice and compete for fantastic prizes. The atmosphere was electric, and it was evident that both beginners and seasoned players were ready for a night of dice-rolling fun. Whether you were a backgammon pro or just looking to enjoy the game in a laid-back setting, this event had something for everyone.

A Night of Gaming and More

The Backgammon Game Tournament at Club Mareva Beirut offered more than just gaming. With a $50 buy-in per person, participants not only got to test their skills but also enjoyed cigars and beverages throughout the evening. This combination of gaming and camaraderie set the stage for an unforgettable experience.

Prizes Galore

The icing on the cake was the incredible prizes awaiting the top three winners. Karim Kanso secured the coveted 1st position and walked away with a G3Ferrari electric humidor, a true treasure for cigar enthusiasts. But the excitement didn't end there; Etienne Meguerditchian and Marie Jose Khoury, the 2nd and 3rd position winners, were rewarded with Xikar accessories, including lighters and cutters.

Sponsors Add Flair

Sponsoring the event were G3Ferrari, La Flor Dominicana, Xikar, and Illy Coffee. Their support added an extra layer of sophistication and excitement to the evening. Illy Coffee provided guests with the perfect caffeine kick, keeping everyone energized and ready for the competition. La Flor Dominicana's premium cigars were a highlight of the event, creating a delightful smoking experience for all.

A Memorable Evening

The Backgammon Game Tournament was not just about competition; it was about creating lasting memories. The event was expertly organized and ran smoothly, with the entire tournament lasting approximately 2.5 hours. Participants enjoyed gaming, camaraderie, and the pleasure of smoking exceptional cigars, all within the welcoming ambiance of Club Mareva Beirut.

In Conclusion

Club Mareva Beirut's Backgammon Game Tournament was a resounding success, combining the thrill of gaming with the luxury of fine cigars and fantastic prizes. With a diverse group of participants, this event exemplified the spirit of friendly competition and camaraderie that makes Club Mareva Beirut a must-visit destination for cigar enthusiasts and gamers in Lebanon. Stay tuned for more exciting events at Club Mareva Beirut, where the worlds of cigars, gaming, and camaraderie collide in the most delightful way. We can't wait to see you at our next event!
